channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Someone Peeing and spitting in the lift. For more than a year now., 21st July
item.description:
A camera in the lift would identify this disgusting person. I don't know what kind of person would do that. Families live here with kids. Lets see if this council cares at all about this community and step up. Super high service charge and no reply here.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Thurtle Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Floodlight in backyard is on 24/7 for nearly a year, 21st July
item.description:
Property seems to be an Airbnb/short stay. Have tried contacting via Airbnb but no reply from landlord. The light is extremely bright and shines into all rooms facing the back of the house like daylight. Hard to block it out. 24/7 day and night it is on.

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No bin emptying or street cleaning in Winchmore Hill by Enfield council, 21st July
item.description:
He council website states -Residential roads are cleansed once a week (Monday to Friday). Shopping areas are cleansed daily, including weekends.- this is from the site. Prince George?s Avenue/ chaseville road, most of eve I?ve road and merrivale has not been cleaned in five weeks. And church hill is only cleaned around the bin area. Chaseville road is a shopping area and prince George?s Avenue and the other roads stated, residential. The site also states – I Fly-tipping on council land There are numerous teams working throughout the day, both proactively and reactively, to clear waste on publicly owned roads and paths.. Yet the fly tips on Downes court happen in broad daylight.. This fly tip is three days in. The other bin in eversely park road is just never emptied until complaints are made and is a regular dumping ground. Concerningly I have repeatedly informed all senior leaders of this at the council. Yet those roads still remain unswept and re absolutely not on a rota of road sweeping once a week. The sane cardboard box that ear marks five weeks without a street clean on prince George?s Avenue is still there How would you like us to deal with this: Clean as stated publicly on the council website.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Eversley Park Road, Southgate, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Continual water running from this drain, 21st July
item.description:
This is just by the tanning shop on the high street - it’s a continuous leak that goes all down the high street. It makes it very slippy and dangerous for people as well as it being so wasteful. It’s on the public high street.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 49a, High Street, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 7725572 Is the previous reference number, 21st July
item.description:

item.description:

item.title: Abandoned bike, 21st July
item.description:

item.title: 96 Great Titchfield street W1 , bags out all day for First mile, 21st July
item.description:
This company TASK PR should not be allowed leave bags out all day for collection by private contractors first mile . They should get first get first mile mobile unit to collect with a couple of hours , residents should not have to be subjected to this ongoing issue when restrictions are put on when residential rubbish can be left out . Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 14, Riding House Street, Fitzrovia, Camden Town, London
Report on FixMyStreet
